DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to demonstrate the multiple-dose efficacy and safety of HKT-500 for the treatment of ankle sprain.
DOC.brief_title: HKT-500 in the Treatment of Adult Patients With Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of HKT-500 in the Treatment of Pain Associated With Mild to Moderate Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: mild to Moderate Ankle Sprain Any women of childbearing potential who has a positive urine pregnancy test, who is lactating, who is not surgically sterile (by tubal ligation or hysterectomy), who is not at least 2 years postmenopausal, or has not practiced an acceptable form of birth control (defined as the use of an intrauterine device with spermicide, a barrier method with spermicide, condoms with spermicide, subdermal implant, oral contraceptives, or abstinence) for at least 2 months prior to Visit 1.
